info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 25 at 4:56PM MST until December 26 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 AM Sunday to 5 PM MST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
